remarks: Cancellation law for common factor in ratio.  ( ~ divcan5 analog.) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Oct-2016.)
statement:
dvrcan5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvrcan5.o $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvrcan5.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvrcan5.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
dvrcan5 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. U /\ Z e. U ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Z ) ./ ( Y .x. Z ) ) = ( X ./ Y ) ) $.
